title: Whitson to command second Axiom Space mission
summary: A former NASA astronaut who holds the record for the most time spent in space by an American will command Axiom Space’s second commercial mission to the International Space Station, the company announced May 25.

title: Whitson to command planned commercial flight to space station
summary: Peggy Whitson, America’s most experienced astronaut, and veteran GT3-class race car driver John Shoffner, a long-time pilot, will anchor a four-person crew launching to the International Space Station aboard Axiom Space’s second commercial trip to orbit, the company announced Tuesday.

title: Axiom Space purchases three Crew Dragon missions
summary: Axiom Space has signed a contract with SpaceX for three additional Crew Dragon missions, enough to meet its projections for private astronaut missions to the International Space Station through at least 2023.

title: NASA Selects Second Private Astronaut Mission to Space Station
summary: NASA has selected Axiom Space for the second private astronaut mission to the International Space Station.

title: NASA selects Axiom for second private astronaut mission to ISS
summary: NASA selected Axiom Space to perform a second commercial flight to the U.S. segment of the International Space Station on a Crew Dragon spacecraft.

title: NASA, Axiom Sign Second Private Astronaut Mission to Space Station Order
summary: NASA and Axiom Space have signed a mission order for the second private astronaut mission to the International Space Station to take place in the second quarter of 2023.

title: NASA completes agreement with Axiom Space for second private astronaut mission
summary: NASA has completed an agreement for a second private astronaut mission to the International Space Station with Axiom Space, the only company that bid on the opportunity.

title: Saudi astronauts to fly on Ax-2 mission to ISS
summary: NASA confirmed Nov. 1 that two astronauts from Saudi Arabia will go to the International Space Station on a private mission in the spring of 2023 operated by Axiom Space.

title: NASA, Partners Clear Axiom’s Second Private Astronaut Mission Crew
summary: NASA and its international partners have approved the crew for Axiom Space’s second private astronaut mission to the International Space Station, Axiom Mission 2 (Ax-2).

title: Saudi astronauts selected for Axiom private astronaut mission
summary: The government of Saudi Arabia has announced the two astronauts who will fly to the International Space Station this spring on a private astronaut mission by Axiom Space.

title: NASA Updates Media on Next Private Astronaut Mission to Space Station
summary: NASA experts will join a virtual press conference hosted by Axiom Space at 12 p.m. EDT Thursday, April 6, to preview the launch of Axiom Mission 2 (Ax-2), the second private astronaut mission to the International Space Station. The Ax-2 launch aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket and Dragon spacecraft is targeted for early May from Launch Complex 39A at

title: Second Axiom Space mission to ISS scheduled for May
summary: Axiom Space’s second private astronaut mission to the International Space Station, commanded by a former NASA astronaut and including two Saudi astronauts, is scheduled to launch as soon as May 8.

title: NASA Sets Coverage for Axiom Mission 2 Briefings, Events, Broadcast
summary: NASA, Axiom Space, and SpaceX will provide coverage of the upcoming prelaunch and launch activities for Axiom Mission 2 (Ax-2), the second private astronaut mission to the International Space Station.

title: SpaceX has narrow window for Ax-2 launch
summary: SpaceX and Axiom Space will have only two opportunities this month to launch a private astronaut mission to the International Space Station before having to wait potentially several months before getting another shot.
